data.name: RPGScenery - Magical Circle Scene
data.detailed_description:
In this pack you'll find three small islands connected with ancient stone bridges, some of them crumbling due to their age. On the last island there is a magical focus point, where wizards and sorcerers and all magic capable person can summon their magic with much more power. They say the summoned magic will be stronger as the night gets darker, but beware! This kind of blessing always comes with a price ...

This DLC contains 2 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
